casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Blake J. REED. No. 141P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. Daniel J. Clifton, Charlotte, for Reed. Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of March 2007 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2007."
